summary: QC PASSED with 0 errors and 0 warnings

checks_performed.details: All required data files present and valid JSON
All programs have required fields (id, title, agency, category, valueUSD, deadline, urgency)
All program links are valid URLs
All deadlines are in valid ISO 8601 format
Programs intentionally appear in multiple categories (e.g., usgs-107 in Funding and LiDAR). This is expected as programs can fit multiple classifications.

data_summary.note: Programs can appear in multiple categories, so category totals sum to more than total unique programs
